title: Samsung will start rolling out the Good Lock 2022 update today, here’s what’s new
content:
After rolling out the first stable build of One UI 4.0 to the Galaxy S21 series last year, Samsung updated some Good Lock modules to support the new software release. Now that the company has released One UI 4.0 based on Android 12 to a bunch of its devices, it’s finally ready to roll out

The post Samsung will start rolling out the Good Lock 2022 update today, here’s what’s new appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Samsung will start rolling out the Good Lock 2022 update today. Check out the post to learn about some of the new features.
